about.title: Who We Are
about.paragraph1: At Criteria Political Communication, we believe in the importance of understanding the digital conversation surrounding political processes. Our multidisciplinary team blends research, data analysis, and technology to provide strategic advice to campaigns, organizations, and institutions aiming to improve their presence and messaging across social media and digital platforms.
about.paragraph2: Since our launch, we have focused on monitoring trends, hashtags, and key opinions that reflect the pulse of public opinion. With an ethical and rigorous approach, we produce regular reports that help our clients make informed and timely decisions.
